long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Zero is the all inclusive cloud communications system designed for modern teams and organizations worldwide. 

Our all in one cloud solution integrates: fully featured voice, secure enterprise messaging, HD voice & video conferencing, contact management, calendar and more. Make and take calls from your PC, mobile and desk phone using your business phone number. 

Setup takes minutes! 

Using Zero you get:

- A fully featured business phone system
- Phone numbers in 50+ countries
- HD voice connectivity to 200+ countries at incredible rates 
- Auto attendant 
- Advanced call controls: Hold, transfer, call forwarding, three-way conference, call parking, intercom and more!
- Unified and visual voicemail
- Unified call logs
- Follow me 
- HD Voice and video conferencing
- Secure team messaging (1:1 and group messaging)
- Contact management
- Cool integrations: Google Calendar and Dropbox.
